snippet: UBS is said to be negotiating settlements over the manipulation of interest rates. | The head of Morgan Stanley's global interest rate desk is under investigation for trading of Treasury futures while at Goldman Sachs. | Delta Air Lines is in talks...
abstract: UBS is said to be negotiating settlements over the manipulation of interest rates. | The head of Morgan Stanley's global interest rate desk is under investigation for trading of Treasury futures while at Goldman Sachs. | Delta Air Lines is in talks to buy a stake in Virgin Atlantic Airways. | Greece has presented the terms of its offer to buy back bonds.

headline.main: UBS Approaches Deal on Rate Rigging
